name: Invest In Humanity
description:
Info

A former keyboard and coffee addict, you decide to funnel your skills towards the betterment of humanity - or so you think. Your job is to trade the Humanity (HMN) stock to survive your trading days. As usual, you might have to resort to manipulation of TV news or have to react quickly to the angry crowds outside.

This game is a submission to One Game A Month #11 with the theme Something From Nothing, and was developed by a team of four during April '22.

How to play

Your job is to buy or sell stock and survive each trading day by accumulating enough cash.

  • BUY when you see positive TV news
  • SELL when you see negative TV news
  • CLICK ON PHONE to change the news
  • PAY ATTENTION to protests and fireworks, they are more important than TV news
Controls
  • Mouse only
